page.title: 11Religion
page.content: In the industrial villages of the area the people went to church or chapel. Saint Mary's church was in Fochriw. It has been demolished.The Fochriw Chapels were Noddfa,Mount Carmel, Methodist and Pentecostal.The Pentecostal is used today.The others have been demolished. Rhymney's Churches are Saint Marks and Saint Matthews.It's chapels are Beaulah and Moriah.The unused ones are Carmel, Emmanuel and The Wesleyan.It also has a Roman Catholic Church. Pontlottyn's Church is St.Tyfaelog's. Its' chapels are Nazareth, Elim and Zoar.Mount Zion has been demolished. Religion was important in the old communities but it is not so important today.
